name: iiot-plc-node-react-dashboard
description: IIoT project: PLC simulation → Node.js API → React dashboard

scripts.dev: npm run dev:setup && npm run dev:all
scripts.dev:setup: docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d postgres mosquitto
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n docker,backend,frontend,simulator -c blue,green,yellow,red "npm run dev:wait-docker" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:simulator"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend-api && npm install && cd ../frontend-dashboard && npm install && cd ../plc-simulator && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend-api && npm run build && cd ../frontend-dashboard && npm run build
